scenario.name: fail_486_busy_here
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:1001@[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=UDP SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:alice@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:1001@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> X-Scenario: fail_486_busy_here Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=- 0 0 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=SIPp c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=sendrecv

ACK sip:1001@[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=UDP SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:alice@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:1001@[remote_ip]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> X-Scenario: fail_486_busy_here Content-Length: 0
